#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		string word;
		cin >> word;
		string sorted_word = word;
		sort(sorted_word.begin() , sorted_word.end());
		int rank,counter=1;
		do
		{
			if(sorted_word == word)
				rank=counter;
			counter++;
		}
		while(next_permutation(sorted_word.begin(),sorted_word.end()));
		
		rank = counter - rank ;

		int number = rank;
		string output;
		while(number!=0)
		{
			int char_no = number % 26;
			number /= 26;
			
			output = (char)(char_no + 64) + output ;

		}

		cout << output;
		cout << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
